full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GNOD SBYIN CHEN PO RDO RJE BDUD 'DUL GYI LAS BYANG YONGS 'DUS KHRI SHING GI 'DON BSGRIGS BLO GSAR DGA' BSKYED BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG BYINGS DANG LHAN GCIG TU SRUNG MA'I 'DIR GTOR CHOG 'DON DGOS TSE, ^PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI BKA' BUM NANG GRAS KYI ZHANG BLON GYI GTOR CHOG JI LTA BA BZHIN DU BTANG NA LEGS PAR SEMS SO, ,'DI YANG SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GI LAS SNE RNAMS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN GZUGS AARTHA SIDHA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU PHYOGS SGRIGS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
